relevant_findings.general: Middle-aged male, disheveled, uncomfortable, lying in bed
relevant_findings.HEENT: Sclera anicteric, PERRLA, opaque clear, poor dentition
relevant_findings.lungs: Initially very diminished bilaterally, sparse inspiratory and expiratory wheezing (much improved after nebulization)
relevant_findings.abdomen: Soft, mild epigastric tenderness on palpation, no rebound, hypoactive bowel sounds, no organomegaly or mass
relevant_findings.neuro/psych: Alert, orientated, speaks in full sentences, equal strength throughout, flat affect
